capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has a pretty severe injury on his forehead. It's shaped like lightning and it's quite deep, I'm not sure how he managed to get it.
I've seen that before, it's a pretty distinctive lightning-shaped wound. I'm not sure what kind of injury would cause that, but it does look like it was inflicted by some kind of magical force.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Dudley's personality, and from what I know, he has a no-rules approach to life. That's really interesting because it suggests that he doesn't follow traditional guidelines or conventions when making decisions or navigating social situations.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of "no rules" before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Dudley has a very laid-back and unconventional personality. That's really interesting to me. I think it's great that he doesn't follow any rules when it comes to his personality - it sounds like he's quite confident in who he is.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the designation of dudley?
